action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X X X X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X X X ▢ ▢
X ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
DESCRIPTION: A 5×5 grid where row one is all X; row two starts with an X then four ▢; row three begins with three X followed by two ▢; rows four and five each begin with an X then four ▢.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X X X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ X
▢ ▢ X X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ X

DESCRIPTION: It’s a 5×5 grid where the first row is all X’s; in the second row, the first four cells are empty (▢) and the last cell is an X; in the third row, the first two cells are empty and the last three cells are X’s; in both the fourth and fifth rows, the first four cells are empty and the last cell is an X.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A 5×5 grid where row one is all X; row two starts with an X then four ▢; row three begins with three X followed by two ▢; rows four and five each begin with an X then four ▢.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Is the cell in row 2, column 1 an X?
